About me

A full stack developer coding since the age of 11 with more than 2 years of experience in leading businesses and solving problems. My motto is to keep learning, continue challenging myself, and do interesting things that matter.

My top skills include JavaScript, React, TypeScript, SSH, C++, Node.js, Parcel, Webpack, Server-Side Rendering, AWS, Code Splitting, Security, Serverless, Load Balancing, Code Analysis, and Performance Optimizations.

Projects

Smart Brain App

A web app built using React for the frontend, Express as RESTful API for the backend and Postgresql as a relational database. Stores hashed passwords securely. Deployed on Heroku, and AWS (Lambda & EC2). Integrated with JWT and Redis (non-relational database) for session management, and Docker.

See Live

Robo Friends

A Progressive Web App (PWA) built with React.js and Redux which fetches users (robots) from an API. It is performance-optimized and integrated with CircleCI for CI/CD, Jest for testing, and Tachyons for styled-components.

See Live Source Code

Gradient Background Generator

Helps to generate color palettes or great backgrounds for our projects. This website uses JavaScript, HTML and CSS.
